summary: Resume tailoring application with AI-powered customization
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Hero background illustration with professional resume or document theme, gradient subtle tones (hero-background.dim_1920x1080.png)

existing_features.title: Create a new Home page component that serves as the landing page with an aesthetic design that entices users to explore the resume tailoring feature
Add a prominent call-to-action button on the home page labeled 'Tailor Resume' that navigates users to the resume tailoring interface
Update App.tsx to implement routing that shows the new home page by default and navigates to TailorResumePage when the call-to-action is clicked
Design the home page with compelling copy and visual elements that communicate the value proposition of AI-powered resume tailoring to attract users

new_feature_requests.summary: Create aesthetic home page with button to access resume tailoring feature
